Translations.Text: veila medyene ehahum su`ayba. kale ya kavmi-`budu-llahe ma lekum min ilahin gayruh. vela tenkusu-lmikyale velmizane inni erakum bihayriv veinni ehafu `aleykum `azabe yevmim muhit
veya kavmi evfu-lmikyale velmizane bilkisti vela tebhasu-nnase esyaehum vela ta`sev fi-l'ardi mufsidin
bekiyyetu-llahi hayrul lekum in kuntum mu'minin. vema ene `aleykum bihafiz
kalu ya su`aybu esalatuke te'muruke en netruke ma ya`budu abauna ev en nef`ale fi emvalina ma nesa'. inneke leente-lhalimu-rrasid

kale ya kavmi era'eytum in kuntu `ala beyyinetim mir rabbi verazekani minhu rizkan hasena. vema uridu en uhalifekum ila ma enhakum `anh. in uridu ille-l'islaha me-steta`t. vema tevfiki illa billah. `aleyhi tevekkeltu veileyhi unib
veya kavmi la yecrimennekum sikaki ey yusibekum mislu ma esabe kavme nuhin ev kavme hudin ev kavme salih. vema kavmu lutim minkum bibe`id
vestagfiru rabbekum summe tubu ileyh. inne rabbi rahimuv vedud
kalu ya su`aybu ma nefkahu kesiram mimma tekulu veinna lenerake fina da`ifa. velevla rahtuke leracemnak. vema ente `aleyna bi`aziz
kale ya kavmi erahti e`azzu `aleykum mine-llah. vettehaztumuhu veraekum zihriyya. inne rabbi bima ta`melune muhit
veya kavmi-`melu `ala mekanetikum inni `amil. sevfe ta`lemune mey ye'tihi `azabuy yuhzihi vemen huve kazib. vertekibu inni me`akum rakib
velemma cae emruna necceyna su`aybev vellezine amenu me`ahu birahmetim minna veehazeti-llezine zalemu-ssayhatu feasbehu fi diyarihim casimin
keel lem yagnev fiha. ela bu`del limedyene kema be`idet semud
velekad erselna musa biayatina vesultanim mubin
ila fir`avne vemeleihi fettebe`u emra fir`avn. vema emru fir`avne birasid
yakdumu kavmehu yevme-lkiyameti feevradehumu-nnar. vebi'se-lvirdu-lmevrud
veutbi`u fi hazihi la`netev veyevme-lkiyameh. bi'se-rrifdu-lmerfud
zalike min embai-lkura nekussuhu `aleyke minha kaimuv vehasid
vema zalemnahum velakin zalemu enfusehum fema agnet `anhum alihetuhumu-lleti yed`une min duni-llahi min sey'il lemma cae emru rabbik. vema zaduhum gayra tetbib
vekezalike ahzu rabbike iza ehaze-lkura vehiye zalimeh. inne ahzehu elimun sedid
inne fi zalike leayetel limen hafe `azabe-l'ahirah. zalike yevmum mecmu`ul lehu-nnasu vezalike yevmum meshud
vema nu'ehhiruhu illa liecelim ma`dud
yevme ye'ti la tekellemu nefsun illa biiznih. feminhum sekiyyuv vese`id
feemme-llezine seku fefi-nnari lehum fiha zefiruv vesehik
halidine fiha ma dameti-ssemavatu vel'ardu illa ma sae rabbuk. inne rabbeke fa``alul lima yurid
